Installing packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse)
```

Importing the data
MPSZ
```{r}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "D:/hoshihui/IS415-VAA/_site/Hands-on Ex/Hands-on Ex01/chap01/data/geospatial", 
                  layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")

glimpse(mpsz)
head(mpsz, n=5)
plot(mpsz)
plot(st_geometry(mpsz))
plot(mpsz["PLN_AREA_N"])
st_crs(mpsz)
mpsz3414 <- st_set_crs(mpsz, 3414)
st_crs(mpsz3414)

```
Cycling Path
```{r}
cyclingpath <- st_read(dsn = "D:/hoshihui/IS415-VAA/_site/Hands-on Ex/Hands-on Ex01/chap01/data/geospatial", 
                         layer = "CyclingPathGazette")

buffer_cycling <- st_buffer(cyclingpath, 
                               dist=5, nQuadSegs = 30)
buffer_cycling$AREA <- st_area(buffer_cycling)
sum(buffer_cycling$AREA)
```
Preschool
```{r}
preschool = st_read("D:/hoshihui/IS415-VAA/_site/Hands-on Ex/Hands-on Ex01/chap01/data/geospatial/PreSchoolsLocation.kml")

preschool3414 <- st_transform(preschool, 
                              crs = 3414)
```

Listings
```{r}
listings <- read_csv("D:/hoshihui/IS415-VAA/_site/Hands-on Ex/Hands-on Ex01/chap01/data/aspatial/listings.csv")

list(listings) 
listings_sf <- st_as_sf(listings, 
                       coords = c("longitude", "latitude"),
                       crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3414)

glimpse(listings_sf)
```

Combination
```{r}
mpsz3414$`PreSch Count`<- lengths(st_intersects(mpsz3414, preschool3414))
summary(mpsz3414$`PreSch Count`)
top_n(mpsz3414, 1, `PreSch Count`)
mpsz3414$Area <- mpsz3414 %>%
  st_area()

```
